title.rendered: Vistara supports Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme

content.rendered:
Vistara supports Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme

 

Vistara has partnered with Smile Foundation to provide lunch meals to 200 children along with supporting the education of 10 children studying in Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centres. Employees from Vistara spent a fun and engaging day with Smile beneficiaries by conducting various cultural activities at their Mission Education centre in Gurgaon. The employees volunteered to distribute lunch, muffins and various goodies to the children which made the day memorable for them.

Vistara is a joint venture of Tata Sons Limited and Singapore Airlines Limited (SIA). The common goal of the joint venture is to redefine air travel in India to provide Indian travellers a seamless and personalized flying experience that blends Tata’s and SIA’s service excellence and legendary hospitality.
